name: errorlens
description: Improve highlighting of errors, warnings and other language diagnostics.

errorLens.fontFamily.description: Font family of message. If the new font breaks layout - try to use smaller fontSize.

errorLens.fontWeight.markdownDescription:
Font Weight of message.

`normal` is alias for 400

`bold` is alias for 700

errorLens.fontStyleItalic.description: When enabled - shows message in italic.

errorLens.margin.description: Distance between the end of the line and the message (CSS units).

errorLens.padding.markdownDescription: Padding of the message. Visible difference when `message` colors are set. [Issue #23](https://github.com/usernamehw/vscode-error-lens/issues/23). Example: `2px 1ch`.

errorLens.borderRadius.markdownDescription: Border radius of the message. Visible difference when `message` colors are set. [Issue #23](https://github.com/usernamehw/vscode-error-lens/issues/23). Example: `5px`.

errorLens.enabledDiagnosticLevels.description: Customize which diagnostic levels to highlight.

errorLens.annotationPrefix.markdownDescription: Specify diagnostic message prefixes (when `addAnnotationTextPrefixes` is enabled). For example, emoji: ❗ ⚠ ℹ.

errorLens.addAnnotationTextPrefixes.markdownDescription: When enabled - prepends diagnostic severity ('ERROR:', 'WARNING:' etc) to the message. (Prefixes can be configured with `annotationPrefix` setting).

errorLens.addNumberOfDiagnostics.markdownDescription: When enabled - prepends number of diagnostics on the line. Like: `[1/2]`.

errorLens.messageEnabled.description: Controls whether inline message is shown or not (Including background highlight).

errorLens.statusBarMessageEnabled.markdownDescription: When enabled - shows message in status bar.

errorLens.statusBarColorsEnabled.markdownDescription: When enabled - use message decoration foreground as color of Status Bar text.

errorLens.statusBarMessageType.markdownDescription: Pick what to show in Status Bar: closest message or only message for the active line.

errorLens.exclude.description: Specify messages that should not be highlighted (RegEx).

errorLens.light.description: Specify color of decorations for when the light color theme is active.

errorGutterIconPath.description: Absolute path to error gutter icon for light themes.

warningGutterIconPath.description: Absolute path to warning gutter icon for light themes.

infoGutterIconPath.description: Absolute path to info gutter icon for light themes.

errorGutterIconColor.markdownDescription: Error color of `circle` gutter icon set for light themes.

warningGutterIconColor.markdownDescription: Warning color of `circle` gutter icon set for light themes.

infoGutterIconColor.markdownDescription: Info color of `circle` gutter icon set for light themes.

errorLens.onSave.description: When enabled - updates decorations only on document save.

errorLens.onSaveTimeout.description: Time period that used for showing decorations after the document save.

enumDescriptions: Highlight only the problem at the cursor
Highlight only closest to the cursor problem
errorLens.followCursor.description: Highlight only portion of the problems.

errorLens.followCursorMore.markdownDescription:
Augments `followCursor`.
Adds number of lines to top and bottom when `followCursor` is `activeLine`.
 Adds number of closest problems when `followCursor` is `closestProblem`

errorLens.gutterIconsEnabled.description: When enabled - shows gutter icons (In place of the debug breakpoint icon).

errorLens.gutterIconsFollowCursorOverrid.description: When enabled and `followCursor` setting is not `allLines`, then gutter icons would be rendered for all problems. But line decorations (background, message) only for active line.

enumDescriptions: Similar to vscode icons in Problems Panel (old).
Similar to vscode icons in Problems Panel (new).
Similar to vscode icons in Problems Panel, only without a border.

errorLens.errorGutterIconPath.description: Absolute path to error gutter icon.

errorLens.warningGutterIconPath.description: Absolute path to warning gutter icon.

errorLens.infoGutterIconPath.description: Absolute path to info gutter icon.

errorLens.errorGutterIconColor.markdownDescription: Error color of `circle` gutter icon set.

errorLens.warningGutterIconColor.markdownDescription: Warning color of `circle` gutter icon set.

errorLens.infoGutterIconColor.markdownDescription: Info color of `circle` gutter icon set.

errorLens.excludePatterns.markdownDescription: Exclude files by using glob pattern.

errorLens.scrollbarHackEnabled.markdownDescription: When enabled - prevents showing horizontal scrollbar for decorations. (Might have a conflict with `errorLens.fontFamily` or `errorLens.padding` settings).

colors.description: Background color of the entire line containing error.
Background color of the error message.
Background color of the entire line containing error (Only in light themes).
Text color used to highlight lines containing errors.
Text color used to highlight lines containing errors (Only in light themes).
Background color used to highlight lines containing warnings.
Background color of the warning message.
Background color used to highlight lines containing warnings (Only in light themes).
Text color used to highlight lines containing warnings.
Text color used to highlight lines containing warnings (Only in light themes).
Background color used to highlight lines containing info.
Background color of the info message.
Background color used to highlight lines containing info (Only in light themes).
Text color used to highlight lines containing info.
Text color used to highlight lines containing info (Only in light themes).
Background color used to highlight lines containing hints.
Background color of the hint message.
Background color used to highlight lines containing hints (Only in light themes).
Text color used to highlight lines containing hints.
Text color used to highlight lines containing hints (Only in light themes).
Status bar item error color.
Status bar item warning color.
Status bar item info color.
Status bar item hint color.
